designScenario.name: Aircraft Hydraulic Fluid Reservoir System
designScenario.description: The Fluid Reservoir System is designed to store, manage, and supply hydraulic fluid under extreme environmental and operational conditions. It incorporates advanced thermal insulation, real-time monitoring, and integrated filtration to ensure consistent fluid quality and pressure. The system supports high-pressure hydraulic actuation systems while maintaining lightweight and durable construction for prolonged service intervals.

details.description: The system must store hydraulic fluid within a temperature range of -40°C to 85°C while maintaining structural integrity.
Supply fluid at a maximum flow rate of 200 liters per minute to meet peak system demands.
Maintain fluid pressure between 2000 and 4500 psi during all operational phases without exceeding ±5% deviation.
The High-Efficiency Filter must remove 99.9% of particulates larger than 5 microns to protect downstream components.
The Leak Detection System must trigger an alarm within 30 seconds of detecting a leak exceeding 0.1 mL/min.
Constructed from titanium alloy to minimize weight while ensuring corrosion resistance and fatigue strength.
Support a service interval of 500 flight hours with routine checks and full maintenance every 2000 flight hours.

systemComponents.name: Fluid Reservoir System
systemComponents.description: Central storage and management unit for hydraulic fluid, ensuring consistent supply under varying operational conditions.

subComponents.name: Reservoir Tank
subComponents.description: Primary container for storing hydraulic fluid with integrated thermal and pressure management features.

subComponents.name: Thermal Insulation Layer
subComponents.description: Multi-layer insulation to maintain fluid temperature stability during extreme environmental conditions.

subComponents.name: Level Sensor
subComponents.description: Electronic sensor to monitor fluid level and trigger refilling alerts.

subComponents.name: Filtration and Pressure Regulation Unit
subComponents.description: Integrated system for filtering contaminants and maintaining optimal fluid pressure.

subComponents.name: High-Efficiency Filter
subComponents.description: Micron-level filter to remove particulates and prevent contamination.

subComponents.name: Pressure Regulator
subComponents.description: Mechanical regulator to adjust fluid pressure within operational limits.

subComponents.name: Leak Detection System
subComponents.description: Pressure-sensitive sensors and alarms to detect fluid leaks in real-time.

relationships.description: The Fluid Reservoir System aggregates the Reservoir Tank as its primary storage component.
The Fluid Reservoir System integrates the Filtration and Pressure Regulation Unit for fluid management.
The Fluid Reservoir System includes the Leak Detection System for operational safety.
The Reservoir Tank incorporates the Thermal Insulation Layer for temperature control.
The Reservoir Tank includes the Level Sensor to monitor fluid levels.
The Filtration and Pressure Regulation Unit contains the High-Efficiency Filter for contaminant removal.
The Filtration and Pressure Regulation Unit includes the Pressure Regulator to control fluid pressure.
The Leak Detection System depends on the Reservoir Tank to monitor for fluid leaks.

attributes.name: operatingPressure
attributes.description: Operating pressure range the reservoir must withstand during flight phases.

attributes.name: fluidType
attributes.description: Specific hydraulic fluid type compatible with extreme temperatures and system components.

attributes.name: thermalRange
attributes.description: Temperature range in which the reservoir maintains optimal performance.

attributes.name: capacity
attributes.description: Total fluid storage capacity of the reservoir system.

attributes.name: material
attributes.description: Primary material used for structural components to ensure lightweight and corrosion resistance.

attributes.name: maintenanceCycle
attributes.description: Recommended service interval for system checks and fluid analysis.

attributes.name: filterEfficiency
attributes.description: Filtration efficiency rating to remove particulates down to 5 microns.

attributes.name: pressureRegulationRange
attributes.description: Pressure range maintained by the integrated pressure regulator.

attributes.name: leakDetectionSensitivity
attributes.description: Minimum leak rate detectable by the leak detection system.

comments.body: Reservoir System manages fuel, hydraulic, and oxygen storage with safety constraints.
